translations: v.（因恐惧或紧张）发抖；震动（quake 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 基因, 发抖的, 害怕得发抖, 颤抖
美洲山杨, 美国山杨, 山杨木, 颤杨
塑性混凝土, 软混凝土
颤沼, 跳动沼, 践动沼

sentences.sentence: If you stand up straight, you'll give an impression of self-confidence, even if you're quaking in your boots.
sentences.translation: 只要你站直了，就会给人一种自信的印象，哪怕你正紧张得发抖。

sentences.sentence: Tom, quaking with fear, yielded, and put his eye to the crack.
sentences.translation: 汤姆吓得发抖，走了过去，贴着裂逢往外看。

sentences.sentence: I just stood there quaking with fear.
